title: SERP Content Crawler
description: Retrieve website content from the top Google Search Results Pages (SERPs)

queries.title: Search term(s)
queries.description: Use regular search words or enter Google Search URLs. You can also apply [advanced Google search techniques](https://blog.apify.com/how-to-scrape-google-like-a-pro/), such as AI site:twitter.com or javascript OR python.
